Test Name: Miscellaneous Tests (LabCorp RTP, NC Analytical Phase)
Specimen Type: Serum, plasma, whole blood, urine (as specified per test)
Purpose: To generate accurate and reliable results for miscellaneous clinical laboratory tests in compliance with regulatory standards.
Container: Appropriate collection tubes such as SST, EDTA, or heparin tubes labeled with patient information
Equipment: Designated analytical instruments with calibrated pipettes and centrifuges, plus required reagents and controls
